News.Title: Tamilnadu Telecommunications Limited Reports Quarterly Financial Results with Continued Losses
News.Summary: Tamilnadu Telecommunications Limited published its unaudited financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, showing a net loss of Rs. 4.29 crores compared to Rs. 3.29 crores loss in the same period last year. The joint venture between TCIL and TIDCO continues to face operational challenges with negative earnings per share of Rs. 0.94 and a debt-equity ratio of -0.20.
